      • printGPA

        private void printGPA(java.lang.String[] operation)

        Takes a instruction line as string array.
        Requests GPA of selected student, from InfoStorage. Buffers the result to FileIO.
        Parameters:
        operation - The instruction that will be executed.

      • register

        private void register(java.lang.String[] operation)

        Takes a instruction line as string array.
        Request the registration of selected student to selected course with given grade, from InfoStorage. Buffers the result to FileIO.
        Parameters:
        operation - The instruction that will be executed.

      • delete

        private void delete(java.lang.String[] operation)

        Takes a instruction line as string array.
        Request deletion of selected student or course, from InfoStorage. Buffers the result to FileIO.
        Parameters:
        operation - The instruction that will be executed.

      • printAllCourses

        private void printAllCourses()

        Request existed course array, from InfoStorage. Buffers the result to FileIO.

      • printAllStudents

        Request existed student array, from InfoStorage. Buffers the result to FileIO.

      • editCourse

        private void editCourse(java.lang.String[] operation)

        Takes a instruction line as string array.
        Request editing of selected course as given instruction, from InfoStorage. Buffers the result to FileIO.
        Parameters:
        operation - The instruction that will be executed.

      • editStudent

        private void editStudent(java.lang.String[] operation)

        Parameters:
        operation - The instruction that will be executed.

      • addCourses

        private void addCourses(java.lang.String[] operation)

        Takes a instruction line as string array.
        Request loading of course information from given location on directory, from InfoStorage. Buffers the result to FileIO.
        Parameters:
        operation - The instruction that will be executed.

      • addStudents

        private void addStudents(java.lang.String[] operation)

        Takes a instruction line as string array.
        Request loading of student information from given location on directory, from InfoStorage. Buffers the result to FileIO.

        operation - The instruction that will be executed.
